author: Geoff Earle
title: John Bercow blocks Trump from speaking at Westminster | Daily Mail Online
text: British Speaker BANS 'racist and sexist' Trump from addressing Parliament but he had no problem with the President of CHINA President Donald Trump heads to Great Britain this spring or summer for an official visit He hosted British Prime Minister Theresa May at the White House last month, and she announced that Trump had accepted the invitation Now John Bercow, the Speaker of the House of Commons, has said he is 'strongly opposed' to allowing Trump to speak because of his recent immigration ban He cited opposition to 'racism, sexism' and belief in an 'independent judiciary' Speaker has power to ban Trump from Westminster Hall but cannot stop him meeting Queen Elizabeth and potentially speaking in other parts of Parliament Speaker has previously welcomed President Obama - and the president of one-party China Published: 22:48 GMT, 6 February 2017 | Updated: 02:09 GMT, 7 February 2017 97 shares
